SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_user (`name`, user_type, mobile_number, passwd, wx_name, img, email, reg_channel_code, reg_channel, prompt_code, referrer_id, create_time, wx_img, wx_open_id, qr_code_img ) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regChannelCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referrerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wxImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrCodeImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_user set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile_number = #{mobileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx_name = #{wxName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_channel_code = #{regChannelCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reg_channel = #{regChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prompt_code = #{promptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, referrer_id = #{referrerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wx_img = #{wxImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx_open_id = #{wxOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qr_code_img = #{qrCodeImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, user_type, mobile_number, passwd, wx_name, img, email, reg_channel_code, reg_channel, prompt_code, referrer_id, create_time, wx_img, wx_open_id, qr_code_img from t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, `name`, user_type, mobile_number, passwd, wx_name, img, email, reg_channel_code, reg_channel, prompt_code, referrer_id, create_time, wx_img, wx_open_id, qr_code_img from t_user
